title: Introduction to Europeana Services
text: Europeana uses Apache Solr platform index data, Search API supports Apache Lucene Query Syntax default. get Europeana repository, advanced users follow Lucene Apache SOLR guides. others, basic querying guide can found Europeana portal, documentation package. query parameter user access rich search functionalities. examples , Simple search: query="Mona Lisa" Boolean Search: query="mona lisa" Range Search" query="[Z]" Timestamp Search: query="timestamp_created:"2013-03-16T20:26:27.168Z" far, ’ve looked cases single query term. sometimes useful divide query variable constant part. example, application accesses objects London, constant part query can pre-select London-based objects variable part can select objects within pre-selection.

title: Introduction to Europeana Services
text: Search API provides auxiliary method translating search terms various languages can used conjunction main Search API method. Wikipedia API used perform actual translation method. method’s signature follows: “europeana.eu/api/v2/translateQuery.json?wskey=YOUR_KEY&term=TERM&languageCodes=LANGUAGE_CODES” *Example:" Get translations “Notre Dame” Dutch, English Hungarian Notice: APIs served unified dedicated address “https://api.europeana.eu/”. path parameter can used access required services.
